title: Wholemeal fruit scones
ingredients: ['500g wholemeal plain flour', '200ml water', '50g natural yoghurt', '125ml extra virgin olive oil', '125g sultanas, or other dried fruit of choice', '32g unrefined brown sugar', '2 teaspoons ground mixed spice', '1/2 bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon cream of tartar', 'a little milk, for glazing']
